snippet: Searching for people at risk of H.I.V. infection, getting them tested and putting those who are infected on antiretroviral drugs immediately has brought results in Canada.
abstract: New HIV and AIDS cases have steadily diminished in British Columbia, Canada, since advent of aggressive treatment campaign by the British Columbia Center for Excellence in HIV/AIDS.
lead_paragraph: Searching for people at risk of H.I.V. infection, getting them tested and putting those who are infected on antiretroviral drugs immediately has brought results in Canada.

headline.seo: New H.I.V. Cases and AIDS Deaths Plummet in British Columbia
headline.main: British Columbia: Aggressive Strategy Lowers the Number of New H.I.V. Cases and AIDS Deaths
headline.print_headline: British Columbia: Aggressive Strategy Lowers the Number Of New H.I.V. Cases and AIDS Deaths
